statements.query: MATCH ((n:AutoScalingGroup)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:AWSOrganization{id: $ORGANIZATION_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})) where EXISTS(n.exposed_internet) WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE REMOVE n.exposed_internet, n.exposed_internet_type return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (route:EC2Route{destination_cidr_block: '0.0.0.0/0'})<-[:MEMBER_OF_ROUTE_TABLE]-(:EC2RouteTable)-[:HAS_ASSOCIATION]->(:EC2RouteTableAssociation)<-[:HAS_EXPLICIT_ASSOCIATION|HAS_IMPLICIT_ASSOCIATION]-(:EC2Subnet)<-[:VPC_IDENTIFIER]-(asg:AutoScalingGroup)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:AWSOrganization{id: $ORGANIZATION_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE route.gateway_id STARTS WITH 'igw-' SET asg.exposed_internet = true,(CASE WHEN NOT 'public_subnet_ipv4' IN coalesce(asg.exposed_internet_type , []) THEN asg END).exposed_internet_type = coalesce(asg.exposed_internet_type , []) + 'public_subnet_ipv4';

MATCH (route:EC2Route{destination_ipv6_cidr_block: '::/0'})<-[:MEMBER_OF_ROUTE_TABLE]-(:EC2RouteTable)-[:HAS_ASSOCIATION]->(:EC2RouteTableAssociation)<-[:HAS_EXPLICIT_ASSOCIATION|HAS_IMPLICIT_ASSOCIATION]-(:EC2Subnet)<-[:VPC_IDENTIFIER]-(asg:AutoScalingGroup)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:AWSOrganization{id: $ORGANIZATION_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE route.gateway_id STARTS WITH 'igw-' SET asg.exposed_internet = true,(CASE WHEN NOT 'public_subnet_ipv6' IN coalesce(asg.exposed_internet_type , []) THEN asg END).exposed_internet_type = coalesce(asg.exposed_internet_type , []) + 'public_subnet_ipv6';

name: AWS auto scale group asset internet exposure
